post.description: Force the integration runtime to synchronize credentials across integration runtime nodes, and this will override the credentials across all worker nodes with those available on the dispatcher node. If you already have the latest credential backup file, you should manually import it (preferred) on any self-hosted integration runtime node than using this API directly.

SubResource.description: Azure Data Factory nested resource, which belongs to a factory.

etag.description: Etag identifies change in the resource.

SecureString.description: Azure Data Factory secure string definition. The string value will be masked with asterisks '*' during Get or List API calls.

store.description: The Azure Key Vault linked service reference.

secretName.description: The name of the secret in Azure Key Vault. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

secretVersion.description: The version of the secret in Azure Key Vault. The default value is the latest version of the secret. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

SecretBase.description: The base definition of a secret type.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

IntegrationRuntimeListResponse.description: A list of integration runtime resources.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

IntegrationRuntimeStatusListResponse.description: A list of integration runtime status.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

autoUpdate.description: Enables or disables the auto-update feature of the self-hosted integration runtime. See https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=854189.

updateDelayOffset.description: The time offset (in hours) in the day, e.g., PT03H is 3 hours. The integration runtime auto update will happen on that time.

concurrentJobsLimit.description: The number of concurrent jobs permitted to run on the integration runtime node. Values between 1 and maxConcurrentJobs(inclusive) are allowed.

LinkedServiceListResponse.description: A list of linked service resources.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.
The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

CreateRunResponse.description: Response body with a run identifier.

ErrorResponse.description: The object that defines the structure of an Azure Data Factory response.

target.description: Property name/path in request associated with error.

ParameterDefinitionSpecification.description: Definition of all parameters for an entity.

ParameterSpecification.description: Definition of a single parameter for an entity.

ParameterValueSpecification.description: An object mapping parameter names to argument values.

vstsConfiguration.description: VSTS repo information of the factory.

createTime.description: Time the factory was created in ISO8601 format.

vstsConfiguration.description: VSTS repo information of the factory.

TriggerPipelineReference.description: Pipeline that needs to be triggered with the given parameters.

identity.description: Managed service identity of the factory.

FactoryUpdateParameters.description: Parameters for updating a factory resource.

identity.description: Managed service identity of the factory.

FactoryIdentity.description: Identity properties of the factory resource.

type.description: The identity type. Currently the only supported type is 'SystemAssigned'.

principalId.description: The principal id of the identity.

tenantId.description: The client tenant id of the identity.

PipelineRunFilterParameters.description: Query parameters for listing pipeline runs.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token for getting the next page of results. Null for first page.

lastUpdatedAfter.description: The time at or after which the pipeline run event was updated in 'ISO 8601' format.

lastUpdatedBefore.description: The time at or before which the pipeline run event was updated in 'ISO 8601' format.

PipelineRunQueryFilter.description: Query filter option for listing pipeline runs.

operand.description: Parameter name to be used for filter.

operator.description: Operator to be used for filter.

PipelineRunQueryOrderBy.description: An object to provide order by options for listing pipeline runs.

orderBy.description: Parameter name to be used for order by.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token for getting the next page of results, if any remaining results exist, null otherwise.

parameters.description: The full or partial list of parameter name, value pair used in the pipeline run.

invokedBy.description: Entity that started the pipeline run.

lastUpdated.description: The last updated timestamp for the pipeline run event in ISO8601 format.

runStart.description: The start time of a pipeline run in ISO8601 format.

runEnd.description: The end time of a pipeline run in ISO8601 format.

durationInMs.description: The duration of a pipeline run.

status.description: The status of a pipeline run.

message.description: The message from a pipeline run.

PipelineRunInvokedBy.description: Provides entity name and id that started the pipeline run.

name.description: Name of the entity that started the pipeline run.

id.description: The ID of the entity that started the run.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

ActivityRun.description: Information about an activity run in a pipeline.

pipelineRunId.description: The id of the pipeline run.

activityRunId.description: The id of the activity run.

linkedServiceName.description: The name of the compute linked service.

status.description: The status of the activity run.

activityRunStart.description: The start time of the activity run in 'ISO 8601' format.

activityRunEnd.description: The end time of the activity run in 'ISO 8601' format.

durationInMs.description: The duration of the activity run.

error.description: The error if any from the activity run.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

properties.description: List of property name and value related to trigger run. Name, value pair depends on type of trigger.

triggeredPipelines.description: List of pipeline name and run Id triggered by the trigger run.

OperationListResponse.description: A list of operations that can be performed by the Data Factory service.

value.description: List of Data Factory operations supported by the Data Factory resource provider.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

Operation.description: Azure Data Factory API operation definition.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

resource.description: The name of the resource type on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: The type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

logSpecifications.description: Details about operations related to logs.

metricSpecifications.description: Details about operations related to metrics.

OperationLogSpecification.description: Details about an operation related to logs.

name.description: The name of the log category.

blobDuration.description: Blobs created in the customer storage account, per hour.

OperationMetricSpecification.description: Details about an operation related to metrics.

displayName.description: Localized display name of the metric.

unit.description: The unit that the metric is measured in.

enableRegionalMdmAccount.description: Whether or not the service is using regional MDM accounts.

sourceMdmAccount.description: The name of the MDM account.

sourceMdmNamespace.description: The name of the MDM namespace.

availabilities.description: Defines how often data for metrics becomes available.

OperationMetricAvailability.description: Defines how often data for a metric becomes available.

blobDuration.description: Blob created in the customer storage account, per hour.
